fields.name: Stop-in Effect:
fields.value: - Draw a chest card (but do not activate any of its effects yet). All players are prompted if they want to bid for the chest card, starting at 50$ and going up in increments of 100$ (or more if players want to bid in a higher increment). The highest bidder gives their bidded money to the auctioneer and obtains the chest card and then effects of that chest card activate. If no one bids, the auctioneer gets it for free.
